DataElement.preferredName: Prior Systemic Therapy Regimen Administered Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to used to determine the number of treatment plans using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body were given at an earlier time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Systemic Therapy Treatment Regimen Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
